dict.acceptation: 准确的；严密的；精密的，精确的；

sent.orig: The solution is exact insofar as the model of the sphere is exact.
sent.trans: 只要球的模型是精确的，这种解释就是精确的。

sent.orig: Exact matches will only reveal matches with that exact search and is much more targeted.
sent.trans: 完全匹配的比赛将只显示与精确的搜索和更加有针对性。

sent.orig: Sometimes you may not know the exact name of the file or the exact search term.
sent.trans: 有时你可能不知道文件的精确名字或精确的搜寻期限。

sent.orig: Good diction means the exact or near exact.
sent.trans: 好的表达意味着精确或接近精确。

sent.orig: The exact cause of the accident is still in dispute.
sent.trans: 事故的真正起因仍有争议。
